welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aba, Nigeria! This vibrant city is known for its bustling markets, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We hope you'll take the time to explore and enjoy all that Aba has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: རྔ་བ་ཟས་རིགས་གཡོ་སྐོལ་ཚང་།·清雅老炒人家（阿坝店）

restaurants.address: 阿坝县德雀路45号, 阿坝藏族羌族自治州, 四川
